entry.title: WIND WARNING, Qualicum Beach
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:23 a.m. PDT Saturday 8 April 2023

entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING, Qualicum Beach
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:22 a.m. PDT Saturday 8 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 10.1Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Qualicum Beach Airport 3:00 PM PDT Saturday 8 April 2023
Temperature: 10.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.2 kPa rising
Humidity: 81 %
Dewpoint: 6.9°C
Wind: ESE 18 km/h gust 31 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: n/a

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of rain. High 9.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Amount 5 to 10 mm except 25 mm between Qualicum Beach and Fanny Bay. Wind southeast 40 km/h except 70 gusting to 90 over exposed coastal sections. High 9. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PDT Saturday 8 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Rain. Low 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers this evening. Rain beginning late this evening. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except 70 over exposed coastal sections early this evening. Low 7. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PDT Saturday 8 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Rain. High 10.
entry.summary: Rain ending late in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Amount 15 mm except 40 mm between Qualicum Beach and Fanny Bay. Wind southeast 40 km/h except 70 gusting to 90 over exposed coastal sections in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High 10. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PDT Saturday 8 April 2023
